definition: Gaza/same as 加沙地帶|加沙地带[Jia1 sha1 di4 dai4], the Gaza strip
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: And when election day dawns at last, Hamas will still be there.
sentences.chinese: 而當選舉那天終於到來時，哈馬斯仍會留在加沙。

sentences.english: I also went to Gaza before the last Israeli incursion a couple of years ago.
sentences.chinese: 幾年前，以色列最後一次入侵加沙之前我到過那裏。

sentences.english: The reason for this, of course, was the fierce battle that was raging in Gaza.
sentences.chinese: 箇中緣由，自是肆虐加沙地帶的激戰。

sentences.english: Palestinians ride horses on the beach of Gaza City on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒星期五，巴基斯坦人在加沙城的海灘上騎馬。

sentences.english: There might even be some pro-Gaza protests.
sentences.chinese: 甚至還會有些支持加沙的示威活動。

sentences.english: In recent years, Israel withdrew from South Lebanon and Gaza.
sentences.chinese: 近些年裏，以色列從南黎巴嫩和加沙撤出。

sentences.english: The third was the war to crush the Hamas missile launchers in Gaza.
sentences.chinese: 第三場戰爭是在加沙地區粉碎哈馬斯的導彈襲擊。

sentences.english: Over 13%, of Gazan homes have been destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 超過13%的加沙家庭都被摧毀。
它使黎巴嫩和加沙屈從。

sentences.english: But Greta Berlin of the Free Gaza Movement says the efforts will continue.
sentences.chinese: 但格里塔自由加沙運動的柏林表示，將繼續努力。

sentences.english: Today, I met with people outside of Shifa Hospital, Gaza City.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我在加沙城的Shifa醫院外遇見一些人。

sentences.english: In retaliation, Israeli authorities demolished the family’s home in Gaza.
sentences.chinese: 爲了報復，以色列當局搗毀了他位於加沙的家。

sentences.english: Intense artillery strikes and waves of aerial bombardment were reported across the Gaza Strip.
sentences.chinese: 深入的炮擊，和飛機轟炸的震顫，貫穿整個加沙地帶。

sentences.english: Gazans speak of policemen overruling the prime minister.
sentences.chinese: 加沙人民稱警察推翻了總理。

sentences.english: The death toll in Gaza now tops more than 540.
sentences.chinese: 目前加沙的死亡人數已經超過540人。

sentences.english: But the group appeared to retain some support among Gaza residents.
sentences.chinese: 不過這個集團似乎還保有一些加沙居民的支持。

definition: Palestine Liberation Organization (PLO)/abbr. for 巴勒斯坦解放組織|巴勒斯坦解放组织[Ba1 le4 si1 tan3 Jie3 fang4 Zu3 zhi1]

pinyin: Ba1 le4 si1 tan3 Jie3 fang4 Zu3 zhi1
